::Battera::

"I was just getting out of the CR. What do you need me to do?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> That was a great joke, Logo!
> 
> ::Zardus/Dark One::
> 
> Zardus and Dark One enter the CR room. Dark One walks to the 
chamber 
> Squizzy was in and presses a few buttons, the door opening.
> 
> Zardus turns around, looking at Battera as Hiss and the other 
> Oblitercons enter, each getting into a different CR chamber after 
> putting DevilDuer in one.
> 
> "Are you damaged?" Zardus asks Battera, looking her over, wondering 
> why she was in the CR room.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > ::Battera:;
> > 
> > She watched Zardus walk past her in the hall. She turned and was 
> > about to say something, but decided to wait.  She followed him 
down 
> > the hall.
